column4: whats the best thing to do when a software install freezes (at applying changes)
and its an install of wine
i wanted to make sure it was frozen :)
what are you installing? some apps requiere you to accept a licence
close the window and run the command "sudo apt-get -f install"
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?
do you have synaptic running too?
no i dont, but software center isnt quitting the install when i close it
look for software-center. right click and kill process
geeks will kill me for saying this: reboot
remember to run "sudo apt-get -f install" after reboot to fix the broken install
